overview: This is a story about the friendship between two girls. In the modern dance class, the beautiful and bold Ye Hong and the delicate and introverted Xiaomi are a pair of good friends. Xiaomi secretly falls in love with the handsome Yaming. They know that Yaming and Ye Hong used to be their first lovers. Yaming still loves Ye Hong, but Ye Hong falls in love with Shen Fang, a painter who has just been disappointed in love. Shen Fang was very indifferent to Ye. Ye Hong saw Yaming with Xiaomi and felt that she had been deceived by Xiaomi. Yaming told Xiaomi that he used to love Ye Hong, but now he loves Xiaomi. Xiaomi doesn't believe it and said...
title: Dancing Girls
